Package com.kewargs.cs309.core.utils.backend.request

Class AbstractRequest<ResponseType,RequestType extends AbstractRequest<ResponseType,RequestType>>

java.lang.Object
com.kewargs.cs309.core.utils.backend.request.AbstractRequest<ResponseType,RequestType>
Type Parameters:
ResponseType - The expected type of the response object.
RequestType - The type of the concrete class extending this abstract class.
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestCall<ResponseType,RequestType>
Direct Known Subclasses:
JsonRequestCall, PlainTextRequestCall
public abstract class AbstractRequest<ResponseType,RequestType extends AbstractRequest<ResponseType,RequestType>> extends Object implements RequestCall<ResponseType,RequestType>
Abstract base class for network requests with Volley, providing a template for request method, URL, response handling, and error handling. It ensures token injection from the session if available and provides a fluent interface for constructing requests.
